putting it all together, what value does: 1572 out of 10, woould definitely continue to use it constantly / daily, for note-taking, exploration, writing, and documentation.

outside of plugins, palettes and other i: I have multiple "stylers", separated for easy categorizing - basic system-wide, columns, specific additional creations, templates, etc. I use templates and icon cusomization a lot - especially favicon, and for templates.
what are we doing well? prompts for thin: I like that everyone continues to be engaged and to develop new solutions / features (even if lately, it sometimes feels like a lot of them are beyond my skill level / knowledge).  I am really looking forward to seeing where it goes!
what could we do better? prompts for thi:
I have left TW - for Notion / Obsidian / etc. But I always come back,

Better? 
- explaining how to host / setup for the non-architect would be good. I'm in IT and not dumb, but... OMG
- improve basic tools / explanations around themes: this alone would be a HUGE help for me - so many more complex themes I want to create and share
with your consent, we would like to publ: Yes, I am happy for my responses to be published
